title: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type. The icon has also changed from the parent java file icon to a generic file icon.
OB:
1) Open an existing java file.
2) Modify the file (e.g., move an existing class).
3) Click the SaveAs icon located next to the Save Icon.
4) A dialog will appear.
5) Browse for a valid container location.
6) Type the filename without the extension.
7) Click Ok.

Observe that the Navigator has added the file in the specified location, but no file extension is shown.
EB:
The file is saved as a generic file, and opening it shows that the file is rendered as plain text.

Expected Behaviour:
The file should be saved with the same extension as the original file, unless explicitly changed.
SR:
1) Open an existing java file.
2) Modify the file.
3) Click the SaveAs icon.
4) Browse for a valid container location.
5) Enter a filename without the extension.
6) Click Ok.

The file should now be saved with the same extension as the original file, unless explicitly changed.
